text: @JoeBiden He isn't capable of being a leader. He is entirely way to narcissistic to worry about or have empathy for anyone and an effective leader must be empathic! Trump only does things that benefit him and he doesn't care if whatever benefits him hurts millions! #COVID19 #TrumpIsAnIdiot
